name: Egora Holding
overview:
It is an investment company based in Munich, Germany.

  • Concentrates on investments in Broadband Communications, Industrial Optronics, Semiconductor Technologies, Business Applications and Services as well as Biotech Platform Technologies.
  • Supports entrepreneurs with high potential technology skills and technical intellectual property who have the vision to build pioneering companies and the potential to become world leaders in their industries.
  • Invests up to EURO 5 million in early-stage companies especially in Germany and European countries.
  • Consists of exceptionally qualified entrepreneurs who unterstand technology, people and markets.
